title: Looking for people to play whatever
body: I've just recently come back to LoL and I'm looking for people to play with. I don't play a lot of ranked but I'm not opposed to it.

replies.body: I've been in Bronze 5 for past 3 years, haven't been eligible for promo in past 4 months, lose more games than I win and pretty much get blamed for every match going horribly bad. So i'm pretty much the worst player in LoL. More than happy to play if you need someone though.

> [{quoted}](name=RedTao,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=tA5k369U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-02T02:08:54.686+0000)
>
> I've been in Bronze 5 for past 3 years, haven't been eligible for promo in past 4 months, lose more games than I win and pretty much get blamed for every match going horribly bad. So i'm pretty much the worst player in LoL. More than happy to play if you need someone though.

lol Blame will always be passed by assholes. I just play this game for fun. I'll add you in a sec. Sorry for late reply
